name: Hero Jump!!
description:
Hero Jump!! is a 1-tap endless game for Apple TV where you have to jump as much stairs as you can within 10 seconds. You earn 4 additional seconds every 20 stairs you climb, so be quick, but also be careful not to miss stairs, make a single jump with a tap on the controller, and a double jump by make a right swipe on it.

You can also buy new characters with the total stairs you get round by round. It’s a simple game, yet very addictive! Have fun with Hero Jump.
